getStackLabels

public StackLabels getStackLabels()
See Also:
setStackLabels(StackLabels)

setStackLabels

public void setStackLabels(StackLabels stackLabels)
Sets the stack labels. The stack labels show the total value for each bar in a stacked column or bar chart. The label will be placed on top of positive columns and below negative columns. In case of an inverted column chart or a bar chart the label is placed to the right of positive bars and to the left of negative bars.

Parameters:
stackLabels -
